name: DOC_INFO_NOTES
description: The DOC_INFO_NOTES table contains notes about documents, including scanned and electronically signed documents.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document information record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of notes for a document information record.

columns.name: DOC_NOTE
columns.description: A line of free text containing information of note for this document.
